recipes.title: Best Avocado Toast in the World
recipes.description: This is a recipe for the best tasting avocado toast in the world. It is rich in healthy fats from the avacados and protein from the poached egg.
instructions: add poached egg on top of avocado toast

recipes.title: Cheese Pizza
recipes.description: This was a recipe handed down to me by my grandmother Ruth who use to make the best cheese pizza.
instructions: sprinkle cheese, olives and arugala on top of dough
bake in the oven for 10mins at 350 degrees F

recipes.title: Vegan Burrito Bowl
recipes.description: I discovered this recipe when I went on a trip to Mexico. a nice lady taught me how to make world famous vegan burrito bowl
instructions: cut up cherry tomatoes, cucumbers and olives into bite size pieces
put all the ingredients into a bowl/container
